summary: App with moderation flow; user requested adding user profiles with Internet Identity login including display name, bio, and avatar image.

existing_features.title: Add Profiles routes to the TanStack Router, including a profiles directory route and an individual profile route that supports viewing a profile by principal string.
Replace the current “Profiles Currently Unavailable” placeholder with a functional Profiles Directory page that lists public directory profiles from the backend and links to each profile view.

Implement the Profile page UI to view a user profile (avatar, display name, bio, links, plushie image grid) and show follow/follower counts and profile like count with Like/Unlike and Follow/Unfollow actions for authenticated users.

Implement an owner-only profile editing experience for the signed-in user, allowing editing and saving of all profile fields: display name, bio, avatar image, links, plushie images, and public directory opt-in.

Implement the missing profile editor components (AvatarUploader, PlushieImagesEditor, EditProfilePanel) with file validation, local previews, and conversion to ExternalBlob, using the existing utilities in the codebase.
Expose Profiles navigation entry points in the UI so users can find the profiles directory and their own profile easily.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add user profiles with Internet Identity login including display name, bio, and avatar image fields.
